short_summary: Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW) \/ Spares \/ Miscellaneous
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal (RFP) No. W8486-249372/A

**Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW) - Spares - Miscellaneous**

**Advertised by**

Department of National Defence

**Bid Closing Date:** December 4, 2023, at 2:00 PM (EST)

**Contact Information:**

Yewon Pyeon

yewon.pyeon@forces.gc.ca
(000) 000-0000

**Summary:**

The Department of National Defence invites bidders to submit a proposal in response to our Request for Proposal (RFP) No. W8486-249372/A for the supply of miscellaneous spares for the Heavy Logistics Vehicle Wheeled (HLVW). The requirement includes the delivery of 21 different items to Canadian Forces Supply Depots (CFSD) in Montreal and Edmonton.

**Key Requirements:**

* Item 1 to 21: Delivery of miscellaneous spares, including hoses, washers, exhaust systems, electrical switches, and other components.
* Items are detailed in the attached Notice of Proposed Procurement document.
* Bidding is open to all interested suppliers.
* Winning proposal will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest price.

**Instructions:**

* Proposals must be submitted by email to DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca
* Electronic submission is the only acceptable method.
* Bidders are required to submit a non-disclosure agreement (Annex C) with their proposal.
* A debriefing may be requested after the bid closing date.

**Documents:**

* Notice of Proposed Procurement document (Eng/Fra)
* Design Data List (DDL)
* Drawings and specifications (available upon request)

**Bidder Guidelines:**

* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, part number, and National Stock Code Classification (NSCC)/Commercial and Government Entity (CAGE) code.
* A debriefing may be requested after the bid closing date.

Please submit your proposal by the bid closing date and time to ensure timely evaluation and consideration. We appreciate your interest in this procurement opportunity.

**Attachments:**

* Notice of Proposed Procurement document (Eng/Fra)
* Design Data List (DDL)

**Language of the Documents:**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Note: The gross list price of the items listed in the solicitation document is estimated to be approximately $500,
